alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN SHELBY, NORTHEASTERN DARKE, SOUTHWESTERN AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHEASTERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Ansonia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, Newport, Anna, Fort Loramie, Ansonia, Russia, Osgood, Chickasaw, North Star, Kettlersville, Yorkshire, Egypt, Darke County Airport, Lake Loramie State Park, Maria Stein, Brock, State Route 47 at US Route 127 and Bulkhead. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 98 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
